sense.def:
One's hair
so tanki izrastki, ki nam v velikem številu rastejo na glavi.

seg.quote: ...a young woman with long blonde hair.

sense.def:
Hairs
so dolge, tanke dlake, ki nam v velikem številu rastejo na glavi in drugih delih telesa.

seg.quote: ...black hairs on the back of his hands.

sense.def:
Hairs
so tudi zelo tanki, nitasti prameni, ki rastejo na nekaterih žuželkah in rastlinah.

seg.quote: The adult beetle has silken hairs on its body.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
makes one's hair stand on end
, nas pretrese ali močno prestraši.

cit.quote: prestrašiti koga, da mu gredo lasje pokonci

seg.quote: She did it with an ease that made his hair stand on end.

sense.def:
To let one's hair down
pomeni popolnoma se sprostiti in uživati.

To be splitting hairs
pomeni, da nekdo dela nepotrebne razlike ali posveča preveč pozornosti nepomembnim podrobnostim.

seg.quote: Am I splitting hairs here? I think not, because this is an important distinction.
